text: Ego Channel is an Israeli digital cable television channel that launched in 2002. Ego's programming is tailored to the "hot-blooded 18-45 male audience". Ego is owned by Ananey Communications, a subsidiary of Disney Platform Distribution.Screen Digest 2002 Company operates Israel's only two interactive television channels. Ego and The Good Life, Programming occurs across four categories: * Non-fiction action * Finance * Boys' toys * Adult. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Television channels in Asia Category:2002 establishments in Asia
title: Ego (TV channel)
